data.name: Coin Pusher World
data.detailed_description:
Twitch Account Is Required



Coin Pusher World is a crowd-play game designed around a old arcade coin pusher machine experience to play with your community.

The thrill of coin dropping is in the palm of your hand. Enjoy the ultimate coin pusher machine experience found at amusement arcades, carnivals and circus!

Try to drop the coins carefully so that they can push the other medals and prizes off of the edge.

To see game commands please see https://coinpusherworld.co.uk/commands.html


Timing in dropping the coin is the key in Coin Pusher World.

IF YOU HAVE ANY ISSUES STARTING THE GAME OR SETTING UP PLEASE CONTACT US VIA Discord https://coinpusherworld.co.uk/discord

We do offer custom in game features and you would need to contact one of the team via discord or visit our website for more details on this.

IF YOU REQUIRE HELP WITH SETTING UP YOUR GAME PLEASE JOIN US IN DISCORD AND CONTACT ONE OF THE ADMIN

data.short_description: Coin Pusher World Is A Twitch Chat Played Game For All Twitch Streamers To Play From The Comfort Of Your Home And Without Paying Out Just To Keep Playing The Game As You Earn Your Coins While Watching Your Streamer Of Your Choice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: All Spec's are tested and work fine without any issues .
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
